usermessage.Hook.description:
USERMESSAGE [Shared] 

[string] name
  The message name to hook to.

[function] callback
  The function to be called if the specified message was received.
Parameters (Optional):

 bf_read msg
 vararg preArgs

[vararg] preArgs=nil
  Arguments that are passed to the callback function when the hook is called. *ring ring*

usermessage.IncomingMessage.description:
USERMESSAGE [Shared] 

[string] name
  The message name.

[bf_read] msg
  The message.
